Event.name: Serving_in_capacity
Event.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> occupies a <fen>Role</fen> in some institution. This <fen>Role</fen>is (usually) temporary and can be occupied by other entities at different periods of time. It is common for a <fen>Duration</fen> of the <fen>Role</fen> to be mentionned. <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Agent">Chris</fex> <t>served</t> <fex name="Role">as chairman of the board</fex><fex name="Duration">for one year</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> is the entity that occpuies the <fen>Role</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Duration</fen> of time that the <fen>Agent</fen> occupies the <fen>Role</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> served in the <fen>Role</fen>. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: serve.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to carry out a functions and duties (for a finite amount of time) associated with an role or office.
